lines.text: Hey, I know how we can figure this one out!
Really? Finally. Lay it on me.
First, we take that sacramental candle the wizard's holding.
Then, we light it with the Harrowed Black Flame, and chant the name of the All-Watcher.
We surround the candle with the Words of Summoning, written on strips of the guy's flesh...
-and then wrest the name of the deceased from the twisted mind of the Dread-
In case you were confused, Seeker, this is the sort of magic I will not be authorizing on behalf of the investigation.
...Hahaha, I'm just joshing you, Leo! C'mon!
(Note to self: be more subtle if you want Leo to let you use magic.)
